bill.title: Public school construction projects; require major projects to meet U.S. Green Building Council's LEED silver standard.
bill.description: An Act To Require Major Facility Projects Of School Districts Which Receive Any Funding In A State Or Local Capital Budget To Be Designed, Constructed And Certified To At Least The United States Green Building Council's Leed Silver Standard; To Authorize A School District To Determine That The Leed Silver Standard Is Not Practicable For A Project; To Require If Leed Standards Are Not Followed For The Project, The School District T0 Report Its Reasons To The State Department Of Education; To Require The State Department Of Education To Adopt Rules And Regulations To Implement This Act; And For Related Purposes.
